pageContent.title: Meeting with Dr. Cardonza – Understanding the Context for the Solution and Maximizing Value
pageContent.descriptionText: <Introtext style="font-family:Helvetica; font-size:16pt; font-weight:bold; color:#cc0033; margin:10px; padding:0 0 0 5px; background:#e8e8e8; border-bottom:1px solid #333; display:block;">Meeting with Dr. Cardonza – Understanding the Context for the Solution and Maximizing Value</Introtext><welcomeText style=" font-family:Helvetica; font-size:12pt; line-height:18pt; text-align:justify; font-weight:normal; color:#333; display:block; margin:0 10px 10px">"This year we feel more pressure to get even better than we have been. We’ve been on the “top hospitals” list two years in a row now – and there’s mounting expectations that we stay on it."</welcomeText>
